page.title: 06SHOPPING IN WEST HULL
page.content: Hessle Road provided excellent shopping facilities for the people of West Hull until the decline of the fishing industry,the demolition of houses and,more recently,the parking restrictions imposed by the work for the new South Orbital Road. The opening of two superstores in West Hull has adversely affected the trade of grocery shops and small supermarkets in our area although our survey showed that some of the shops have attracted custom back by introducing longer opening hours and Sunday trading. A questionaire completed by shoppers revealed that many preferred to do their weekly shopping "under one roof"and found the garden centre and D.I.Y department at one store an added bonus.
